system.description:
While you are attuned to and wearing this necklace of serrated teeth, you gain a bite natural weapon attack that deals [[/r 1d6 #magical piercing]] magical piercing damage, and you cannot become diseased or poisoned from anything you eat or drink.

In addition, you may eat anything organic that can reasonably fit in your mouth without difficulty (or regard for taste) and gain sustenance from doing so as if you have consumed a normal meal.

Curse. Your appearance and aura carries a hint of malice and despair. You have disadvantage on Charisma checks and beasts are hostile towards you.

! Foundry note: create a separate bite attack manually.
system.craftingComponents: Calcified eyes and teeth of a ghoul
